chunks.text: Hi guys, in this video I will guide you how to download YouTube Shorts video on both PC and mobile device. If you find this tutorial useful, please consider subscribing and liking to support my channel. So firstly you need to find a Shorts video you'd like to download. It works for both PC and mobile. Then click on the Share button. Then copy the link here. You can do the same on your mobile phone too. Next open a new browser page. Paste.

the link in the search bar. Then change shorts to video. And tap Enter. Now it will take you to the video page. And here is a download button. You can then click on it to download the video. This is a premium feature of YouTube by the way. That's it for this guide. If you find it useful, please like and subscribe. Thanks for watching.
